attributes.action: Force the Justice Minister Lord Falconer to resign his position
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the announcement from Lord Falconer that serious criminals should not be jailed and re-offenders treated leniently, he has demonstrated that he is unfit to hold the office of Justice Minister in that the victims of crime are to be denied justice and the PM should force his resignation forthwith

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
